parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: Aligned
parameters.description: Specifies whether to align the lifecycle of the application in the Kubernetes cluster with that of the microservice.

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the alert rule. Valid values:

*   `true`: enables the rule.
*   `false`: disables the rule.

parameters.name: FuncType
parameters.description: The slope of the prefetching curve.

parameters.name: LossLessDetail
parameters.description: Specifies whether to display online and offline processing details.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The microservice namespace to which the rule applies.

parameters.name: Related
parameters.description: Specifies whether to associate with service prefetching.
